function.description: Calculate the probability that at least two specified outcomes occur using complementary probability concepts.
function.name: calculate_probability

total_outcomes.description: Total possible outcomes of a situation.

function.description: Evaluate probabilities associated with rolling dice or similar games.
function.name: evaluate_probability

function.description: Calculate the arrangements of distinct items considering duplicates.
function.name: calculate_arrangements

duplicates.description: Counts of each duplicated item by their identifier.

total_items.description: Total number of items to arrange.

function.description: Calculate the expected number of rolls given specific outcomes and total days.
function.name: calculate_expected_rolls

days.description: Number of days in the period.

p_rolls.description: The probability of successfully rolling (1 or repeated).
